I'm just a simple man trying to make my way in the universe.

3D Printing Nerd, and Gaming Nerd.

Sci Fi book reading nerd

Big fan of the Seattle Sounders Football Club.

Married with 1 kid, 3 cats.

I play games for fun, I design games for game, and work on mobile video games... for the money, but it can be fun too.

ADHD, Liberal, Progressive, Anti-Fascist, LGBTQI+ Ally. (and if any of that bothers you, you can get fucked.)
